description: Kohlrabi (Brassica oleracea (Gongylodes Group)) is an amazing plant species for many reasons. It is known for its unique, swollen, edible stem that is juicy and tender. It is also high in essential vitamins and minerals such as vitamin C and potassium, making it a great source of nutrition. Furthermore, this hardy vegetable does not require much maintenance and does well in both hot and cold weather. It has a mildly sweet taste and can be eaten raw or cooked. Plus, it looks pretty too! Kohlrabi is a must-have plant for any garden!
